meta.article_title: April 11, 2011 - The Value of Down the Line

the_value_of_down_the_line.probleme: Hitting the ball back the way it's coming (crosscourt)

debutant.step: Hit the ball back the way it's coming

exercices_complementaires.description: Use both sides of the table; hit forehand to backhand and backhand to forehand.

metriques_progression.reps: 15.5 more inches of table when hitting down the line
